> Hi Max,
>    What this operator.journal file is. And why this is need. The
> exception

You can use the journal to take personal notes during the crawl. It's
normally not needed (unless you take notes) and is just a plain text file.
The crawler should work fine even with the exception you reported thrown
(you will see more exceptions during the crawl, that's not unusual.
Heritrix will reported them but it won't normally affect its operation).
Important problems are always reported in the Alerts-section of the Web UI.

Max
